column2: an A.M. Eatery////I got the pancake flight and my hubby got the beni duo. It was all really good and our server was really nice. I can see why there would be a wait at this place on the weekend. Â Luckily
column3: we were able to go on a weekday morning so no wait at all. Unfortunately
column4: the parking lot is small so you most likely have to street park. In the flight you get to choose 3 different pancakes to try so I got the blueberry
column5: sweet potato and the peach cobbler. Surprisingly
column6: the sweet potato was my favorite of the three
column7: but all of them were really good. Hubby thought the eggs Benedict was really good but be prepared for heavy richness from the hollandaise sauce. We would definitely come back.
